R Packages and Users Observatory 0.7.0
  • Reference

R Users and Packages Recommendation Engine

Source: R/observatory-application_layer-Agent.R
Agent.Rd

Recommend R Users on Github some R packages that they may like.

packages to user methods

  • random returns the information of random packages

See also

Other R Ecosystem classes: Ecosystem, QueryDB, QueryQueue

Methods

Public methods

  • Agent$new()

Method new()

Instantiate an Agent object

Usage

Agent$new(ecos = Ecosystem$new())

Arguments

ecos

(Repository) An Ecosystem object.

Method recommend_packages_to_user()

Given a user_id suggests n packages the user might like.

Usage

Agent$recommend_packages_to_user(user_id, n, method)

Arguments

user_id

(integer) Github User ID.

n

(integer) How many recommendation should the function return.

method

(character) The recommendation filtering technique to employ. See packages to user methods section for details.

Returns

(data.frame)
